title: Countdown Episode 6 Release Date, Time, Where to Watch
description: The Countdown Episode 6 release date and time is right around the corner, and fans want to know all about the streaming details. The crime-drama series is created by Derek Haas. It follows Mark Meachum, an LAPD Detective, joining a secret task force to find the culprit of the murder of a Department of Homeland […] The post Countdown Episode 6 Release Date, Time, Where to Watch appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Shazmeen Navrange
excerpt: Are you eager to know the release date and time for Countdown Episode 6? Then, here's all you need to know.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: The Countdown Episode 6 release date and time is right around the corner, and fans want to know all about the streaming details. The crime-drama series is created by Derek Haas. It follows Mark Meachum, an LAPD Detective, joining a secret task force to find the culprit of the murder of a Department of Homeland Security officer. As the team dives deeper into the case, they learn about the bigger conspiracy at play. In the previous episode, the team was determined to find out files related to Volchek. So, they headed to the Belarusian consulate. These files, if discovered, would help them learn more about Volchek and his intentions. The upcoming episode, “A Needle or a Bullet,” will focus on the team’s new lead, taking them to the California desert. Their primary suspect will be ready to put on a good fight, while Volchek will get ready to move to the next step in his plan. Here’s all you need to know about the upcoming episode. When is the Countdown Episode 6 release date & time? The episode’s release date is July 16, 2025, and its release time is 12 a.m. PT and 3 a.m. ET. Check out its release times in the U.S. below: TimezoneRelease DateRelease TimeEastern TimeJuly 16, 20253 a.m.Pacific TimeJuly 16, 202512 a.m. Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in Countdown right here. Where to watch Countdown Episode 6 You can watch Countdown Episode 6 via Prime Video. Prime Video is a popular streaming service that offers a wealth of original programming. It consists of hit movies and shows like The Boys, Invincible, Nocturne, Birds of Paradise, Cinderella, and many more. Basic subscription plan begins at $14.99 per month and$139 per year. What is Countdown about? The official synopsis for Countdown is as follows: “When an officer with the Department of Homeland Security is murdered in broad daylight, LAPD detective Mark Meachum is recruited to a secret task force, alongside undercover agents from all branches of law enforcement, to investigate. But the hunt for the killer soon uncovers a plot far more sinister than anyone could have imagined, kicking off a race against time to save a city of millions.”
html:
The Countdown Episode 6 release date and time is right around the corner, and fans want to know all about the streaming details. The crime-drama series is created by Derek Haas. It follows Mark Meachum, an LAPD Detective, joining a secret task force to find the culprit of the murder of a Department of Homeland Security officer. As the team dives deeper into the case, they learn about the bigger conspiracy at play.

In the previous episode, the team was determined to find out files related to Volchek. So, they headed to the Belarusian consulate. These files, if discovered, would help them learn more about Volchek and his intentions. The upcoming episode, “A Needle or a Bullet,” will focus on the team’s new lead, taking them to the California desert. Their primary suspect will be ready to put on a good fight, while Volchek will get ready to move to the next step in his plan.

Here’s all you need to know about the upcoming episode.

When is the Countdown Episode 6 release date & time?

The episode’s release date is July 16, 2025, and its release time is 12 a.m. PT and 3 a.m. ET.

Check out its release times in the U.S. below:

Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in Countdown right here.

Where to watch Countdown Episode 6

You can watch Countdown Episode 6 via Prime Video.

Prime Video is a popular streaming service that offers a wealth of original programming. It consists of hit movies and shows like The Boys, Invincible, Nocturne, Birds of Paradise, Cinderella, and many more. Basic subscription plan begins at $14.99 per month and

$139 per year.

What is Countdown about?

The official synopsis for Countdown is as follows:

“When an officer with the Department of Homeland Security is murdered in broad daylight, LAPD detective Mark Meachum is recruited to a secret task force, alongside undercover agents from all branches of law enforcement, to investigate. But the hunt for the killer soon uncovers a plot far more sinister than anyone could have imagined, kicking off a race against time to save a city of millions.”
